title: Austria Prime Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in Austria increased to 2.11 percent in September from 1.93 percent in August of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in Austria averaged 3.22 percent from 1999 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 7.02 percent in November of 2000 and a record low of 1.57 percent in February of 2021. In Austria, the prime lending rate rate is the floating rate of interest charged on loans of up to and including EUR 1 million EUR by commercial banks to new businesses. This page provides - Austria Prime Lending Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Oesterreichische Nationalbank
